mapper.select: SELECT b.* from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY sluice_id) rn , a.* from (select DISTINCT s.* , ob.type from observ_data ob right JOIN sluice s ON ob.sluice_id = s.sluice_id order by name) a ) b where rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE sluice SET name = #{name}, mapy = #{mapy}, mapx = #{mapx}, area = #{area}, address = #{address}, is_deleted = #{is_deleted} WHERE sluice_id = #{sluice_id}
